post.body: And THEY must include enough info in reply, but do not, and thus I do not follow them if they offer too many bad @replies! Get it?
Good question. How do we know if a free eBook is legally free to download and not pirated?
Did you see these free eBooks? http://tinyurl.com/5qjoq9
The mines say Salazar has NOT done well by them, and the Army definitely is mad he won't help them get Pinon Canon.
Just don't start all your updates as @replies. I can see them, but most of my followers who aren't following you won't. The end.
Hope all goes well with Mom. Hospitals and holidays don't go well together. Well, and you can keep hospitals anytime, says me.
Got three sets of great names in the obituary today! Almost better than the phone book.
You don't have to see your followers @replies to everyone unless your settings allow it.
Hahaha. That's not cold. Three shirts and a coat is cold weather. All wool. And longjanes under it all.
Posted a recipe, but here's the special cordon bleu http://tinyurl.com/8qu9z5
Wienerschnitzel is a no-brainer. Thin veal with a savory breading and lemon slices. Try Cordon Bleu for a real treat!
Come join the alumni group at http://groups.yahoo.com/group/BBTCafe Tell Holly, too!
Waiting list is in place just in case I hit 150. Then I start booting off the non-participants to make room. :D Not to worry.
Yep, dial-up for moi. Most tiresome.
Congrats & RT @GraywolfPress One of our poets, Elizabeth Alexander, was just selected as Obama's inaugural poet: http://tinyurl.com/44r43l
Newcomers to Twitter, do make a few interesting posts and give us a photo and short bio before you start following people.
Retweet @Greenbot Retweet- 1.5 hours of pedaling = full cell phone battery charge http://tinyurl.com/5uor9x
Operative in managing @ replies: "@username replies will appear differently to your followers depending on their settings." Key info.
More @username confusion. er, I mean, help http://tinyurl.com/2v8wts
Everyone and @Booklorn Read this http://tinyurl.com/29wnjw for @reply clarification.
Talking to yourself at http://bloodredpencil.blogspot.com Don't do that too often or else!
You can follow 1,000 people and read their updates, but if they don't follow you back, they don't know your updates exist. Confuses newbies.
One of the most confusing things about Twitter for newcomers is how the timeline works. You follow & see my updates. I follow and see yours.
My @replies like to @Booklorn are visible to my followers. But my followers @replies aren't necessarily visible to me or my followers.
When I check a follower and they have lots of @replies or very few updates, I rarely follow them back. Part of how I manage my timeline.
Why you should attend a book fair next year at http://bloodredpencil.blogspot.com
Retweet @mikecane http://tinyurl.com/9jookw on how to end all plant life on the planet. Let's not tho.
Wienerschnitzel recipe here - http://tinyurl.com/8jvvu9 Easy peasy. ;)
Walmart now selling iPhones. So more can stay connected with fancier gadgetry, but isn't it the real luxury to be inaccessible for a while?
Have you started the Twelve Days of Christmas? http://tinyurl.com/vm6sd Today is the second day of Christmas.
Libraries and technology - @tashrow sounds like a librarian who knows about that and should be followed!
Okay, everyone, gonna go watch Miracle on 34th Street. Might be the highlight of the day after car breaking down enroute to family dinner.
Missed dinner w/ the folks, but at least had good leftovers at home. Chicken cordon bleu and mulled wine which makes all things okay. Hic.
Well, less than memorable Xmas. Trip to the city to have dinner w/family, fuel pump gave out, 2 hrs. waiting for tow, now back home. Bleh.

Sometimes I follow tweeps back just because they love chocolate. :)
I had a dream last night that I was only following 200 tweeps. What does that mean, do you think? Too much Twitter? LOL.
